HeroSection.messageOne: A full-stack developer with 7 years of experience, specializing in custom web solutions. I transform complex challenges into elegant, user-friendly applications.
HeroSection.messageTwo: From concept to deployment, I develop modern web applications using React and TypeScript on the frontend, paired with PHP and MySQL backend solutions.
HeroSection.messageThree: Outside of coding, I enjoy soccer and reading — maintaining a healthy balance between technical and creative pursuits.

itemOne.title: PHP Developer | KBU Logistik AG | Sep 2021 - Dec 2024

list.listItemOne: - Developed a web application for warehouse management system to optimize worker navigation and inventory tracking.
list.listItemTwo: - Implemented feature improvements allowing more efficient menu entry creation with reduced code duplication.
list.listItemThree: - Utilized PHP, JavaScript, Oracle PL/SQL, HTML, and CSS to build and enhance web application functionality.
list.listItemFour: - Collaborated with small team to iteratively develop and maintain logistics software solution.

PrivacyPolicyPage.introText: At Adrian Goerken ('I,' 'my,' 'me'), I am committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a safe online experience. This Privacy Policy outlines how I collect, use, and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (EU) 2016/679 and German data protection laws.

section4.title: 4. Image Hosting via Imgur
section4.description: This website uses Imgur.com as a third-party service to host and deliver images. When you view pages containing images on this website:

list.purpose: Images are loaded from Imgur's servers, which is necessary to display the visual content of this website.
list.dataTransfer: Your IP address and basic browser information may be transmitted to Imgur's servers located in the United States when loading images. This data transfer is necessary for technical delivery of the images to your device.

imgurPrivacy.imgurPrivacy1: Imgur processes this technical data according to their privacy policy, which you can review at
imgurPrivacy.imgurPrivacy3: They have implemented appropriate safeguards for international data transfers.
imgurPrivacy.ariaLabel: Imgur Privacy Policy (opens in new tab)

section5.title: 5. Legal Compliance
section5.description: This website complies with GDPR, EU, and German data protection regulations by not collecting personal data.
